duties_responsibilities.duty: Diagnose and repair fountains, vendors, coolers, and other beverage dispensing equipment to the customers’ satisfaction; properly manage tools and parts; maintain records and reports, safely and efficiently per Company standards.

Assist Territory Manager by transferring and receiving parts and assets, assisting with parts inventories, filling in as needed for the Fountain Installer or Delivery Installer, and visiting customers.

Drive safely following all motor vehicle laws without distraction and maintain a safe working environment by completing all assigned safety training activities and adhering to all safety policies and procedures.
Operate handheld devices to maintain accurate delivery, removal, and movement records, including parts inventory accountability.
Provide great customer service and communication to internal and external customers with the ability to sell revenue-generating service through the proposition.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED with 1-3 years of work experience.Valid driver’s license, with a minimum of Commercial Driver’s License (CDL) Class B or ability to obtain required license within 6 months.
